MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the CH8 postcode area of Holywell, affecting properties in Station Road and surrounding streets. This is causing flickering power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.21PM. Our engineers are on their way to the area and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.30PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 7.58PM on 5th February 2021
